#summary This page contains information about the CDF FusionChartComponent.

= Introduction =

The Fusion Chart Plugin have a javascript framework to easily add a chart to a CDF dashboard.

This framework have a CDF component that can be used like another CDF component. 

TODO:describe the include of the JS File

To use this component you have to create a CDF component with type: "FusionChartComponent".

Example:

var fusionChartsCDFComponent = {
                name: "fusionChartsComponent",

		action: "xFusionFile.xfusion",

		solution: "xFusionFileSolution",

		path: "xFileSolutionFilePath",

		type: "FusionChartComponent",

                chartDefinition: MetaLayerFusionCharts.CdfMetalayer,

		htmlObject: "numContratosLineChartId",

		executeAtStart: true

}

var MetaLayerFusionCharts={
           numClientesLineChartDef: {

		width: "460",

		height: "210",

                cdaDataAccessId:"1",

		chartType: "MSColumn3D",

		cdaParameters:"data",

		data:function(){ return data;}
	}
}
